definition: a specialized bony substance covering the root of a tooth, to make fast as if with cement
details:
noun
- a specialized bony substance covering the root of a tooth
= synonyms: cementum
- something that hardens to act as adhesive material
- a building material that is a powder made of a mixture of calcined limestone and clay
- concrete pavement is sometimes referred to as cement
= example: concrete pavement is sometimes referred to as cement
- any of various materials used by dentists to fill cavities in teeth
verb
- to make fast as if with cement
= example: to make fast as if with cement
- to bind or join with or as if with cement
- to cover or coat with cement
